search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LeagueApps (leagueapps.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the LeagueApps pricing page is [https://leagueapps.com/pricing](https://leagueapps.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
LeagueApps Pricing - LeagueApps
===============
       

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services.

*   Allow all
*   Deny
*   Show details

Allow selection

Necessary (27)

Show details (Necessary)

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

Preferences (2)

Show details (Preferences)

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

| Name | Provider | Purpose | Maximum Storage Duration | Type |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| adroll#adroll | leagueapps.com | Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain | Persistent | IndexedDB |

Show details (Marketing)

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

Get a Demo

Pricing That Puts Youth Sports Leaders First
--------------------------------------------

We don’t make money until you do. No subscription fees. No contract lock-ins. No ads. You pay a small fee as a percentage of each payment transaction with LeagueApps’ pricing.

[Get a Quote](https://join.leagueapps.com/pricing-request/)

What Makes Our Pricing Different?
---------------------------------

Our transparent and straightforward pricing accounts for the size and type of your organization and any add-ons you need to grow your business—from websites to team communication apps and more!

![Image 38](https://leagueapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/img2-26.png.webp)

![Image 39](https://leagueapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/flexible_commitment.svg)

### Flexible Commitment

Pay as you go. No long-term commitments required.

![Image 40](https://leagueapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Account_management.svg)

### One Time Setup Fee, Lifetime Service

Pay a small, one-time fee to get up and running on LeagueApps, then enjoy the free support forever

![Image 41](https://leagueapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/percent.svg)

### Only Pay When You Earn

We collect a small % of your online transactions, and there is no cost for offline payments. Consistent % pricing for credit card fees guaranteed.

![Image 42](https://leagueapps.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/no_invoice.svg)

### No Time-consuming Invoices

We automatically take the small fee out of each registration payment. No monthly or annual invoices. Easy to track through LeagueApps Gateway.

![Image 43](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

### Powerful Add-ons

Pay an annual fee for optional services like our branded team communication apps or a custom youth sports website design service.

![Image 44](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

### Tailored Discounts

Volume discounts for larger organizations. Discounted rates for non-profit organizations.

![Image 45](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

### Powered by the Best

Quick setup. Payments straight to your bank account. No storage fees. Top-notch security. That’s why we power LeagueApps Gateway with Stripe.

![Image 46](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

### Credits and Refunds

When you refund, we refund 100% of the refunded amount back to the cardholder and pay back your transaction fees. It’s easy to issue credits for future registrations.

###### Case Study

### Gateway Field Hockey

Founded in 1985 in St. Louis, MO, Gateway has grown from a single summer camp into one of the most successful field hockey clubs in the country. They are consistently ranked #1 in Missouri and one of the top 10 in the USA—a testament to their focus on coaching and commitment to player development.
